original_text: And there was also a strife among them, which of them should be accounted the greatest.
korean_text: 또 그들 사이에 그 중 누가 크냐 하는 다툼이 난지라

sentences.original_text: And there was also a strife among them,
which of them should be accounted the greatest.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 누가 가장 큰 자로 여김을 받아야 할지.
